I had written a letter yesterday.

question: وہ دو گھنٹے سے کرکٹ کھیل رہا تھا جب بارش ہوئی۔
options: He had been playing cricket for two hours when it rained.
He was playing cricket for two hours when it rained.
He played cricket for two hours when it rained.
answer: He had been playing cricket for two hours when it rained.

question: میں نے اپنی ہوم ورک مکمل کر لیا تھا جب دوست آئے۔
options: I had finished my homework when friends came.
I finished my homework when friends came.
I was finishing my homework when friends came.
answer: I had finished my homework when friends came.

question: اس نے کل فلم دیکھی۔
options: He was watching a movie yesterday.
He had watched a movie yesterday.

question: وہ کتاب پڑھ رہا تھا جب فون آیا۔
options: He was reading a book when the phone rang.
He read a book when the phone rang.
He had read a book when the phone rang.
answer: He was reading a book when the phone rang.

question: میں نے کل دو گھنٹے سے کام کیا تھا۔
options: I had been working for two hours yesterday.
I was working for two hours yesterday.
I worked for two hours yesterday.
answer: I had been working for two hours yesterday.

question: ہم نے کل اسکول کا کام ختم کیا۔
options: We were finishing school work yesterday.
We had finished school work yesterday.
